mapper.select: SELECT g.prg_no, g.prg_nm, g.prg_nope, g.prg_nmtm, GET_WEEK_DAY(g.prg_dow) AS prg_dow, GET_CD_NM('CO0020', g.prg_cd) AS prg_cd, GET_CD_NM('CO0010', g.prg_hr) AS prg_hr, (SELECT c.cns_nm FROM counselor c WHERE c.cns_no = g.cns_no) AS cns_nm, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(LEFT(g.prg_schdl, 8), '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(RIGHT(g.prg_schdl, 8), '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d')) AS prg_schdl, s.req_open, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT a.stud_no), 0) AS applyCount FROM grprograms g JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT prg_no, req_open FROM grschedule) s ON s.prg_no = g.prg_no LEFT JOIN grschedule sch ON g.prg_no = sch.prg_no LEFT JOIN graply a ON sch.GRSCH_NO = a.grsch_no WHERE g.prg_aprv = '1' AND s.req_open = '1' GROUP BY g.prg_no, g.prg_nm, g.prg_nope, g.prg_nmtm, GET_WEEK_DAY(g.prg_dow), GET_CD_NM('CO0020', g.prg_cd), GET_CD_NM('CO0010', g.prg_hr), cns_nm, prg_schdl, s.req_open ORDER BY g.prg_no DESC;

SELECT prg_no, prg_nm, prg_content, prg_nmtm, prg_nope, prg_place, GET_WEEK_DAY(prg_dow) AS prg_dow, GET_CD_NM('CO0020', prg_cd) AS prg_cd, GET_CD_NM('CO0010', prg_hr) AS prg_hr, (select c.cns_nm from counselor c where c.cns_no = g.cns_no) AS cns_nm, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(LEFT(g.prg_schdl, 8), '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(RIGHT(g.prg_schdl, 8), '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d')) AS prg_schdl FROM grprograms g WHERE prg_no = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.stud_no) AS COUNT FROM grprograms p JOIN grschedule s ON p.prg_no = s.prg_no JOIN graply a ON s.grsch_no = a.grsch_no WHERE p.prg_no = #{prg_no} AND a.stud_no = #{stud_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grprograms (prg_nm, cns_no, prg_cd, prg_nope, prg_content, prg_schdl, prg_hr, req_end, prg_dow, prg_nmtm, prg_place) VALUES (#{prg_nm}, #{cns_no}, #{prg_cd}, #{prg_nope}, #{prg_content}, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{prg_start}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d'), ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{prg_end}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d')), #{prg_hr}, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{req_end}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d'), #{prg_dow}, #{prg_nmtm}, #{prg_place})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM grprograms ORDER BY prg_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grschedule (prg_no, prg_ymd, prg_hr) VALUES (#{prg_no}, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{prg_ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d'), #{prg_hr})
mapper.select: SELECT prg_no FROM grprograms WHERE cns_no = #{cns_no} ORDER BY prg_no DESC LIMIT 1
